title: Neurodesign-Based Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Creative Thinking and Innovator Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific problem-solving skills and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing task relevance for professional practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can solve scientific problems with over 80% accuracy and originality by applying neurodesign principles
Learners enhance creative thinking competencies by performing three or more iterative prototyping cycles using mixed research methods
Learners propose four or more innovative solutions through project-based assessments and achieve an average rating of 4.0/5.0 or higher from peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
